90881.神の緋石は にぶい光を放っている。: The Divine Crimsonite casts a dim light.

90882.<center>我が子孫へ。国貧しく 民飢えし時\n恵みの果実を育て 糧とせよ。:
"To my descendants: when the kingdom is in need, and the people hungry, take this blessed fruit to grow and feed them."
"I, under the Divine Crimsonite's care, leave you these blessed fruits."
"Under the Divine Crimsonite's protection, even in a tomb where the Sun's light cannot reach, eternal fruitfulness is assured."

90883.<center>神々の時代 勇気の象徴である 人間の神\nグランゼニスは 命の尽:
"During the time of the Gods:
The embodiment of courage & God of Humans, Gran Zenith—at the end of his life—cast his blood with the power of protection upon the land."
"That blood transformed into giant gems that emit power to safeguard the land of Lendersia from evil- doers, and became known as 'Divine Crimsonite'."
"Those of Arahaghiro's Royal Family's blood: continue to protect the Divine Crimsonite. For as long as it exists, the world will be undying."

90884.神の緋石は 神代のチカラを取り戻し\nまばゆく輝いている。:
Having been restored to its ancient, divine power,
the Divine Crimsonite casts a dazzling light.
